projects.name: Balancer
projects.description: A cutting-edge, open-source, self-hosted platform that empowers users to automate the Value Averaging Strategy for Bitcoin.

projects.name: uipalettes
projects.description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that provides web developers access to a curated library of high-quality color palettes that fully comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).

projects.name: Published Packages
projects.description: A collection of publicly released npm packages, designed to streamline and enhance your web development process. Discover a diverse collection of libraries, frameworks, and command-line tools (CLIs) tailored to various needs.

projects.name: Kaggle Notebooks
projects.description: A collection of Jupyter Notebooks I've developed and shared publicly on Kaggle. Explore data analysis projects, machine learning models, and other insightful explorations across diverse datasets. Feel free to use, adapt, and contribute to these notebooks as you embark on your own data science journey!

responsibilities: Led the development of Balancer, a sophisticated cryptocurrency trading platform built upon the foundation of Epoca, specifically designed for the Spot Market.
Implemented a robust value averaging strategy, further enhancing the platform's ability to optimize asset accumulation and manage risk for long-term investment goals.
Integrated several Exchange APIs, giving users the flexibility to choose the platform that best meets their needs.
Continued to leverage advanced data analysis techniques and real-time market data feeds to support informed trading decisions.
Led the development of a sophisticated automated trading platform for Bitcoin Futures Market trading.
Fully integrated Binance APIs to collect historical Bitcoin data, enabling the construction of robust datasets and advanced trading automation.
Designed and implemented a proprietary Value Averaging Strategy, optimizing asset accumulation and managing risk for effective portfolio management.
Leveraged TensorFlow/Keras and Hyperparameter Tuning Techniques to build machine learning models for predicting market states and price trends, enhancing trading decision-making.
Integrated comprehensive market data feeds and analytics tools, empowering users with real-time data-driven insights for informed trading decisions.
Conducted thorough backtesting and validation to refine trading algorithms and validate their effectiveness, ensuring optimal performance.
Led the development of a secure, scalable and user-friendly peer-to-peer cryptocurrency exchange platform from ideation to production, integrating multiple cryptocurrencies for seamless trading.
Implemented robust security measures including encryption, two-factor and three-factor authentication, and secure wallet management, ensuring user funds and data safety.
Developed comprehensive user account features such as registration, KYC verification, and customizable settings for a tailored user experience.
Integrated third-party services like Blockcypher and Bitgo to interact with various blockchains, facilitating a wider range of supported cryptocurrencies.
Designed and implemented secure escrow services, safeguarding transactions and releasing funds only upon completion of trade terms.
Developed a system for dispute resolution to handle conflicts between users, promoting a fair and transparent environment.
Developed a custom real-time chat system and provided technical support to users, addressing inquiries and issues, and ensuring a positive user experience.
Ensured cross-platform compatibility for a seamless user experience across all devices and browsers.
Conducted rigorous quality assurance testing, including security, functional, and load testing, to identify and address vulnerabilities.
Led the end-to-end development of a scalable and user-friendly educational gaming platform, seamlessly integrating front-end UI and back-end logic for a rich user experience.
Designed and implemented interactive quiz modules, enhancing learner engagement and improving knowledge retention through gamification.
Fully integrated the YouTube Data API, enabling real-time tracking of user learning progress and providing valuable insights for content improvement.
Collaborated effectively with a diverse team, including designers, content creators, and educators, to deliver a comprehensive learning experience.
Developed intuitive content management interfaces, empowering content creators to efficiently manage quizzes, educational content, and learning resources.
Maintained and troubleshooted computer hardware and software issues, ensuring optimal network performance and user experience.
Collaborated with team members to design, develop, and deploy custom software applications to automate daily tasks, improving efficiency and productivity within the company.
Digitized, cleaned, and processed large datasets from surveys, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.
Utilized data analysis techniques to identify trends and patterns, generating insightful reports for council decision-making.
Developed data processing scripts and tools to streamline data analysis and reporting.
Maintained and troubleshooted computer hardware and software issues, ensuring optimal network performance and user experience.
Configured and managed network devices, including routers, switches, and firewalls.
Performed software updates and security patches, ensuring system stability and data integrity.
Provided technical support to customers, diagnosing and resolving a range of hardware and software problems.

certifications.degree: Open Source Software Development, Linux and Git
